languages.text: "Боюсь, в таком случае госпожа Хейдари никогда не сможет получить желанную грамоту. А на ваше благородное имя я буду вынуждена направить штраф — за потраченное время Мастера Печатей".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, в таком случае госпожа Хейдари никогда не сможет получить желанную грамоту".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, в таком случае госпожа Хейдари никогда не сможет получить желанную грамоту. А на ваше благородное имя я буду вынуждена направить штраф — за потраченное время Мастера Печатей".

traits.locale_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “那么，恐怕海达利女士将永远都无法得到她迫切渴望得到的执照，而我将不得不对你尊贵的名字征收罚款，因为你浪费了印章大师的宝贵时间。”
languages.original_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."

traits.locale_text: “那么，恐怕海达利女士将永远都无法得到她迫切渴望得到的执照，而我将不得不对你尊贵的名字征收罚款，因为你浪费了印章大师的宝贵时间。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «En ese caso, me temo que la señora Heydari nunca recibirá su tan deseado certificado y yo me veré obligada a multar{mf|le|la} a usted por hacer que la Maestra de Sellos pierda su valioso tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, me temo que la señora Heydari nunca recibirá su tan deseado certificado y yo me veré obligada a multar{mf|le|la} a usted por hacer que la Maestra de Sellos pierda su valioso tiempo».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「その場合は申し訳ありませんが、ミストレス・ヘイダリ待望の証明書はお出しできません。また、陛下の高貴な家名に罰金を科さざるをえなくなります…印章長の貴重な時間をムダにしたのですから」
languages.original_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."

traits.locale_text: 「その場合は申し訳ありませんが、ミストレス・ヘイダリ待望の証明書はお出しできません。また、陛下の高貴な家名に罰金を科さざるをえなくなります…印章長の貴重な時間をムダにしたのですから」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, j'ai bien peur que maîtresse Heydari ne reçoive jamais le certificat tant convoité. Quant à moi, je me verrai dans l'obligation de vous infliger une amende pour avoir fait perdre un temps précieux à la maîtresse des sceaux. »
languages.original_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, j'ai bien peur que maîtresse Heydari ne reçoive jamais le certificat tant convoité. Quant à moi, je me verrai dans l'obligation de vous infliger une amende pour avoir fait perdre un temps précieux à la maîtresse des sceaux. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, dann wird Herrin Heydari ihr ersehntes Zertifikat niemals erhalten. Und ich werde gezwungen sein, eine Strafe gegen Euren edlen Namen zu verhängen – weil Ihr die Zeit der Meisterin der Siegel verschwendet habt."
languages.original_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, dann wird Herrin Heydari ihr ersehntes Zertifikat niemals erhalten. Und ich werde gezwungen sein, eine Strafe gegen Euren edlen Namen zu verhängen – weil Ihr die Zeit der Meisterin der Siegel verschwendet habt."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "O hâlde korkarım Üstat Heydari, o çok istediği tasdiknameyi asla elde edemeyecek. Ben de Mühür Üstadı'nın değerli vaktini boşa harcadığınız için soylu isminize para cezası yazmak zorunda kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "Then, I'm afraid, Mistress Heydari will never receive her much-desired certificate. And I will be obliged to levy a fine against your noble name — for wasting the valuable time of the Master of Seals."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde korkarım Üstat Heydari o çok istediği tasdiknameyi asla elde edemeyecek. Ben de Mühür Üstadı'nın değerli vaktini boşa harcadığınız için soylu isminize para cezası yazmak zorunda kalacağım."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
